www.aokp.co - Find all newest releases here.

Select a custom zip from sdcard to use as your new boot animation
No application found to pick the zip file. Please install a file manager.
You can remove the wallpaper from the menu in this window
Please enter a new label. Enter an empty label to revert to stock label.
Wake up device if a charger is plugged/unplugged.
Screen will animate an Electron Beam when turned off
Allow your device to rotate upside down!
Displays a button to kill all apps on recents window
Shows RAM usage in the recents menu
Holding hardware back button will kill the current activity
This will switch to Tablet UI (requires reboot)
Hide some systembar stuff i.e. the compat. mode button(requires UI restart)
This will Enable/Disable Dual panel view (requires reboot)
Display the 3-dot overflow menu button within apps
The menu overflow button may not be visible until apps are restarted
The menu overflow button may not be hidden until apps are restarted
Display the name of the currently connected Wifi network
Allows you to slide your finger along the top of the statusbar to change the brightness. Does nothing when autobrightness is enabled.
What style to display NavBar and Statusbar\nChanges will force SystemUI Restart
Phone - NavBar to side in landscape
Phablet - NavBar stays at bottom in landscape
Make sure you follow the steps one-by-one and complete each one before proceeding to the next.
1. Change LCD Density to stock value
Tablets and older phones use 160. Most phones use 240. Galaxy Nexus uses 320 by default.
Come back here after the reboot and complete the rest of the steps!
"Market data couldn't be cleared, please clear it yourself!"
Press back when done to return here.
"Couldn't open the market! If you're sure it's installed, open it yourself from the launcher."
5. Change density to whatever you like!
If you ever have compatibility issues with the market, be sure to return here and repeat the process.
"Changing your LCD density can cause unexpected app behavior. If you encounter market app incompatibility please return here and restart the process from step 1."
Whether to show icons or text on your toggles.
Choose how many toggles to show per row
Choose the order which your toggles are displayed
Short press for Settings, Long press for Toggles
Short press for Toggles, Long press for Settings
Reset all toggles and their order
Choose which side the fast toggle area shall be
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Remember to remove your menu buttons if you\'re using the big menu button!
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Choose the number of navigation buttons
100 is 70\%% of screen width, 5 is 30\%% of screen width. 0 will default to per button width.
Navigation Bar height while in portrait.
Navigation Bar height while in landscape.
Navigation Bar height if the bar is along a side.
You should reboot right now to make sure everything works properly!
Please reboot for height change to be added properly!
If checked, custom icons will be colorized
When you press on a button, there is a glow. Use this to change the color of the glow.
Swipe to view - Click to choose
Show arrow keys in the navigation bar while typing
Timeout time for Hidden Navbar Window
Do you want to reset the navigation ring?
Choose number of targets in the navigation ring
Drag your finger to targets to assign actions
Click on the LED to change the color
"Would you like to change the app: "
". Please turn off your screen to see the LED. Don't hit OK on this popup till you're done viewing the LED color."
Limit each app\'s notification sounds to play once per the set value
What to do with sound when headphones are plugged in and out
What to do with sound when A2DP is connected
What to do with sound when you flip your phone face down
Time the screen is off before the flip sensor is disabled
Time required for your phone to be considered face down

Your phone will flip over to go to vibrate or silent on how you choose. It will take 1.5 (default) seconds to change once flipped over. It will then disable the flip once the screen is turned on after 15 (default) seconds. NOTE: **You will need to turn the screen back on once flipped over to get sound back once the screen timeout time has been reached.**
Flip your phone to silent when receiving a call
Unlock password/pin lockscreen without pressing enter button
Use the menu key to unlock the screen
Lockscreen will have ability to rotate via device orientation. This is independent of Auto-rotation in display
Warning** Some widgets are not intended to be used on the lockscreen, The widget maker and AOKP are not responsible for your choice of lockscreen widgets. Choose responsibly.
Warning** Adding too many widgets can cause lag issues with lockscreen.
Always show battery percentage on the lockscreen
Set whether the hints for the left and right widgets are shown when the screen is turned on.
Set whether the lockscreen challenge (circle, pattern, pin) is minimized when the screen is turned on.
This enables your device to be unlocked with the widgets maximised by long pressing the lock icon.
Use a carousel animation when switching between lockscreen widgets.
Long press volume buttons to skip tracks while screen is off. Volume wake will not work when music is playing.
Use the stock layout when playing music.
You can remove the wallpaper from the menu in this window
Show Weather Information on Lockscreen. You need to enable ROMControl\'s Weather service to use this
Whether to show graphical or text weather information.
Show upcoming event(s) from your calendar on the lockscreen.
Select the calendars you want to see.
Select the time-range to be displayed.
If enabled, events will be colored like in your calendar.
If enabled, events which already started won\'t show up.
If enabled, the widget will display multiple events by flipping between them.
Choose the animation speed in seconds.
Drag the unlock icon to targets to assign targets
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
How many targets do you want?
You must have at least one target that unlocks the screen!
Delete all user created lockscreen target and restore to default?
Select or change the desired application or activity and the associated icon
Whether to pull weather information and display it throughout the ROM.
Setting a custom location can save some battery. Otherwise network-location is used to determine your location.

Be sure to follow the examples! Setting an invalid location will stop you from getting weather updates and may cause unexpected behavior.\n\nExamples: New York,NY // New York, NY // 10033 // London, England
Enabling this will display weather temperature in Celsius rather than Fahrenheit and windspeed in km/h rather than mph.

"Obtaining location from network is currently disabled. This breaks the ability to get the current weather in your current location. Please set a custom location or enable obtaining your location from your network."
Unable to retrieve location information for weather update

You can create your custom vibration patterns in 5 simple steps:
 - Tap New/Reset
 - Tap Record
 - Record your pattern by hitting the TAP! button
 - Tap Stop
 - Tap Save, enter a name and hit OK

 You can check what you just recorded by tapping the Play button.
 If you wish to modify an already saved pattern, tap Load, choose a pattern, re-record, and save it again (it will be overwritten, even if you choose another name).
 To delete a pattern, tap Delete, choose your pattern and tap Delete again. You cannot delete the Default vibration.

 You can choose the default vibration for your phone calls in Phone/Settings or in Settings/Sound.
 You can assign custom vibration patterns to your contacts in the People app: after loading a contact tap Menu/Set vibration.
Concede pink unicorns are for little girls
